text: ide riti, heccina bahudevaradhakarige, (devatvadallina) avara paludararu tam'ma makkala hatyeyannu candaganisi bittiddare â€“ avarannu nasa padisalikkagi mattu avara dharmavannu avarige aspastagolisalikkagi. Allahanu icchisiddare avaru hage maduttiralilla. Niviga avarannu mattu avaru kattuttiruva sullugalannu avara padige bittu bidiri
